front.title: ISO/CCITT and Internet Management Coexistence (IIMC): Translation of Internet MIB-II (RFC1213) to ISO/CCITT GDMO MIB (IIMCMIB-II)

abstract.t: This document is intended to facilitate the multi-protocol management coexistence and interworking for networks that are managed using the ISO/CCITT Common Management Information Protocol (CMIP) and networks that are managed using the Internet Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP). This document contains the ISO/CCITT GDMO definition and registration of MIB-II as derived from the Internet MIB-II [RFC1213], according to the procedures defined in 'Translation of Internet MIBs to ISO/CCITT GDMO MIBs' [IIMCIMIBTRANS]. In addition, this document includes a translated IPForwarding Table as derived from the Internet definition in [RFC1354].
